vote.text: Amendment SA 1761 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Motion by Senator Reid to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 1761 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 25) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 1761 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 25.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1761 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 1761 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S1179) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1761 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 1761 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 25.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1761 proposed by Senator Reid.
